file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    email: support@yugabyte.com
    name: Yugabyte Cloud Support
    url: https://support.yugabyte.com/
  description: YugabyteDB as a Service
  license:
    name: Properietary (TBD)
    url: https://www.yugabyte.com/yugabyte-cloud-terms-of-service
  termsOfService: https://www.yugabyte.com/yugabyte-cloud-terms-of-service
  title: Yugabyte Cloud
  version: v1
servers:
- description: Endpoint of the API server
  url: '{protocol}://{host_port}/api'
  variables:
    protocol:
      default: http
      enum:
      - http
      - https
    host_port:
      default: localhost:1323
security:
- BearerAuthToken: []
tags:
- description: Account APIs
  name: account
- description: Customer facing alerting related APIs
  name: alerts
- description: Public APIs for customer facing audit events
  name: audit-event
- description: Authentication related APIs
  name: auth
- description: Backup related APIs
  name: backup
- description: Billing related APIs
  name: billing
- description: Billing invoices APIs
  name: billing-invoice
- description: APIs for cluster CRUD
  name: cluster
- description: APIs for getting information about an existing cluster
  name: cluster-info
- description: APIs for cluster networking CRUD
  name: cluster-network
- description: APIs for cluster creation related parameters
  name: cluster-resources
- description: Health Check endpoint APIs
  name: health-check
- description: Private APIs to retrieve information about accounts
  name: internal-account
- description: Private APIs for authentication
  name: internal-auth
- description: Private APIs to interact with backups
  name: internal-backup
- description: Private APIs for Billing
  name: internal-billing
- description: Private APIs to interact with clusters
  name: internal-cluster
- description: Private APIs for getting information about an existing cluster
  name: internal-cluster-info
- description: Private APIs to interact with cluster allow list associations
  name: internal-cluster-network
- description: Private APIs to interact with custom image sets
  name: internal-custom-image-set
- description: Private APIs for email
  name: internal-email
- description: Private APIs for fault injection
  name: internal-fault-injection
- description: Private APIs for Logger
  name: internal-logger
- description: Private APIs for Maintenance
  name: internal-maintenance
- description: Private API for information about the Yugabyte Cloud application
  name: internal-metadata
- description: Private APIs for metering
  name: internal-metering
- description: Private APIs to interact with the VPCs and subnets
  name: internal-network
- description: Private APIs to interact with the YB platforms
  name: internal-platform
- description: Private APIs for runtime configuration
  name: internal-runtime-config
- description: Private APIs to manage scheduled upgrades
  name: internal-scheduled-upgrade
- description: Private APIs to interact with software releases
  name: internal-software-release
- description: Private APIs to manage internal tags
  name: internal-tags
- description: Private APIs to interact with tasks and scheduled tasks
  name: internal-task
- description: Private APIs to interact with task events
  name: internal-task-event
- description: Private APIs to manage users
  name: internal-user
- description: Private APIs for xCluster replication
  name: internal-xcluster-replication
- description: Public APIs to manage maintenance windows and events
  name: maintenance
- description: APIs for network related APIs
  name: network
- description: APIs for network related parameters
  name: network-resources
- description: Project APIs
  name: project
- description: Read Replica related APIs
  name: read-replica
- description: Public APIs to manage scheduled upgrades
  name: scheduled-upgrade
- description: APIs to retrieve software release related info
  name: software-release
- description: Task related APIs
  name: task
- description: Public APIs to be consumed by ui
  name: ui
- description: User related APIs
  name: user
paths:
  /public/accounts:
    get:
      description: Get account by name
      operationId: getAccountByName
      parameters:
      - description: Filter accounts by name
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: name
        required: true
        schema:
          minLength: 1
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Account_Response'
          description: Account response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Get account by name
      tags:
      - account
    post:
      description: Create an account
      operationId: createAccount
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/AccountSpec'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Account_Response'
          description: Account response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Create an account
      tags:
      - account
  /public/accounts/{accountId}:
    delete:
      description: Delete an account
      operationId: deleteAccount
      parameters:
      - description: ID of account to return
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Account successfully deleted
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Delete account
      tags:
      - account
    get:
      description: Get an account
      operationId: getAccount
      parameters:
      - description: ID of account to return
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Account_Response'
          description: Account response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Get account info
      tags:
      - account
    put:
      description: Modify account
      operationId: modifyAccount
      parameters:
      - description: ID of account to return
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/AccountSpec'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Account_Response'
          description: Account response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Modify account
      tags:
      - account
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/users:
    get:
      description: List users
      operationId: listUsers
      parameters:
      - description: ID of account associated to the user
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Filter users by email
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: email
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Filter users by first_name
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: first_name
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Filter users by last_name
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: last_name
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Filter users by state
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: state
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Order of results
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: order
        required: false
        schema:
          default: asc
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Sort results by attribute
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: order_by
        required: false
        schema:
          default: email
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Limit number of results returned per page
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          default: 25
          maximum: 100
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
        style: form
      - description: Boundary before next page
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: continuation_token
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/User_List_Response'
          description: List of users
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: List users
      tags:
      - account
    post:
      description: Invite user to signup for the account
      operationId: inviteAccountUser
      parameters:
      - description: ID of account to invite user to
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/InviteUserRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Invite_User_Response'
          description: Invite User response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Add or Invite user to account
      tags:
      - account
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/users/batch:
    post:
      description: Batch invite users to signup for the account
      operationId: batchInviteAccountUser
      parameters:
      - description: ID of account to invite users to
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/BatchInviteUserRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Batch_invite_User_Response'
          description: Batch invite User response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Batch add or invite user to account
      tags:
      - account
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/users/{userId}:
    delete:
      description: Remove user from account
      operationId: removeAccountUser
      parameters:
      - description: ID of account of the project
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: ID of the user to get the account info
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: userId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          description: User successfully deleted
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Remove user from account
      tags:
      - account
    get:
      description: Get a user
      operationId: getAccountUser
      parameters:
      - description: ID of the associated account
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Email of the user to get the account info
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: userId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/User_Response'
          description: User response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Get user info
      tags:
      - account
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/users/{userId}/roles:
    put:
      description: Modify user role
      operationId: modifyUserRole
      parameters:
      - description: ID of associated account
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: ID of associated user
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: userId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/ModifyUserRoleRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successfully modified user role
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Modify user role
      tags:
      - account
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/allowed_login_types:
    get:
      description: Get allowed login types for account
      operationId: getAllowedLoginTypes
      parameters:
      - description: ID of associated account
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Allowed_login_types_response'
          description: Allowed login types for account
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Get allowed login types for account
      tags:
      - account
    put:
      description: Modify allowed login types for account
      operationId: modifyAllowedLoginTypes
      parameters:
      - description: ID of associated account
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/ModifyAllowedLoginTypesRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successfully modified allowed login types
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Modify allowed login types for account
      tags:
      - account
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/alert_rules:
    get:
      description: API to fetch the alert rules for an account
      operationId: listAlertRules
      parameters:
      - description: ID of the associated account
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Alert_rules_list_response'
          description: Alert rules list response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: API to fetch the alert rules for an account
      tags:
      - alerts
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/alert_rules/{alertRuleId}/test_email:
    post:
      description: API to send test email alerts to users of an account
      operationId: sendTestEmailAlert
      parameters:
      - description: ID of the associated account
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: ID of the alert for changes
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: alertRuleId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/AlertTestEmailRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Test email successfully sent
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: API to send test email alerts to users of an account
      tags:
      - alerts
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/alert_rules/{alertRuleId}:
    put:
      description: API to modify alert rule for an account
      operationId: updateAlertRule
      parameters:
      - description: ID of the associated account
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: ID of the alert for changes
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: alertRuleId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/AlertRuleSpec'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Alert_rule_response'
          description: Alert rule response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: API to modify alert rule for an account
      tags:
      - alerts
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/alerts/notifications:
    get:
      description: API to fetch the alert notifications for an account
      operationId: listAlertNotifications
      parameters:
      - description: ID of the associated account
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Severity level
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: level
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Fetch new alerts
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: fetchNewAlerts
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
        style: simple
      - description: Listing by source i.e CLUSTER or BILLING
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: source
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Limit number of results returned per page
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          default: 25
          maximum: 100
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
        style: form
      - description: Boundary before next page
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: continuation_token
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Alert_notifications_list_response'
          description: Alert notifications list response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: API to fetch the alert notifications for an account
      tags:
      - alerts
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/audit/events:
    get:
      description: Get list of audit events for a given account
      operationId: listAuditEvents
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - explode: false
        in: query
        name: search
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - explode: false
        in: query
        name: event_type
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - explode: false
        in: query
        name: resource_type
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Query start timestamp in UTC
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: start_timestamp
        required: false
        schema:
          example: 2021-08-06T08:37:27.707Z
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Query end timestamp in UTC
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: end_timestamp
        required: false
        schema:
          example: 2021-08-06T08:37:27.707Z
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Limit number of results returned per page
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          default: 25
          maximum: 100
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
        style: form
      - description: Boundary before next page
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: continuation_token
        required: false
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Order of results
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: order
        required: false
        schema:
          default: desc
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Sort results by attribute
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: order_by
        required: false
        schema:
          default: created_on
          type: string
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/List_Audit_Event_Response'
          description: List Audit Event Response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Get list of audit events for a given account
      tags:
      - audit-event
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/audit/events/{auditEventId}:
    get:
      description: Get detailed information about a specific audit log event
      operationId: getAuditEventById
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: auditEventId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Audit_event_response'
          description: Audit event response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Get detailed information about a specific audit log event
      tags:
      - audit-event
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/audit/categories:
    get:
      description: Get audit event categories
      operationId: getAuditEventCategories
      parameters:
      - explode: false
        in: path
        name: accountId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Audit_Event_Categories_Response'
          description: Audit Event Categories Response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Get audit event categories
      tags:
      - audit-event
  /public/accounts/{accountId}/quotas:
    get:
      description: Get account quotas

  /public/ui/callback/sso_signup:

      parameters:

        required: true
        schema:
          enum:

      - description: Authorization code returned by SSO provider
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: code
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Two letter country code as defined in ISO 3166
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: country_code
        required: false
        schema:
          maxLength: 2
          minLength: 2
          pattern: ^[A-Z][A-Z]$
          type: string
        style: form
      - description: Marketing consent of the user
        explode: false
        in: query
        name: marketing_consent
        required: false
        schema:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        style: form
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Login_Response'
          description: Successful login response
        "400":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
        "500":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
          description: API Error
      summary: Callback for SSO signup
      tags:
      - ui

components:
  requestBodies:
    AccountSpec:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AccountSpec'
      description: Account to be added to the cloud
      required: true
    InviteUserRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteUserSpec'
      description: User to be invited
      required: true
    BatchInviteUserRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/BatchInviteUserSpec'
      description: List of user to be invited
      required: true
    ModifyUserRoleRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModifyUserRoleRequest'
      description: Request to modify user role
      required: true
    ModifyAllowedLoginTypesRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModifyAllowedLoginTypesRequest'
      description: Request to modify allowed login types
      required: true
    AlertTestEmailRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AlertTestEmailRequest'
      description: Alert rule specification
    AlertRuleSpec:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AlertRuleSpec'
      description: Alert rule specification
    LoginRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/LoginRequest'
      description: Request for logging in a user
      required: true
    AuthTokenSpec:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AuthTokenSpec'
      description: Auth token spec
    BackupSpec:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/BackupSpec'
      description: Backup to be created
    RestoreSpec:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestoreSpec'
      description: Backup to be created
    BackupScheduleSpec:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/BackupScheduleSpec'
      description: Schedule to be created
    EstimateClusterCostRequest:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/EstimateClusterCostSpec'
      description: Create estimate cluster cost request
    BillingProfileSpec:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingProfileSpec'
      description: Billing profile spec
    PaymentMethodSpec:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:

      type: object

    VpcData:
      description: Information about the VPC
      example:
        vpc_id: vpc_id
        vpc_type: Private
        cloud_info:
          region: us-west2
        cidr: cidr
        cloud_project: cloud_project
      properties:
        vpc_id:
          description: The reference ID of the VPC in the provider cloud
          type: string
        cloud_project:
          description: The account in AWS/project in GCP that this VPC belongs to.
          type: string
        cloud_info:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/CloudInfo'
        cidr:
          description: A CIDR block
          pattern: ^([0-9]{1,3}\.){3}[0-9]{1,3}($|/((?:[0-9]|[12][0-9]|3[012])))$
          title: CIDR Block
          type: string
        vpc_type:
          enum:
          - Private
          - Shared
          type: string
      title: VPC Data
    VpcDataResponse:
      description: Information about the VPC
      example:
        id: 046b6c7f-0b8a-43b9-b35d-6489e6daee91
        vpc_data:
          vpc_id: vpc_id
          vpc_type: Private
          cloud_info:
            region: us-west2
          cidr: cidr
          cloud_project: cloud_project
        num_clusters: 0
      properties:
        id:
          description: The ID of the VPC
          format: uuid
          type: string
        vpc_data:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/VpcData'
        num_clusters:
          type: integer
      title: VPC Data Response
    SubnetData:
      description: Information about the Subnet
      example:
        is_primary: true
        subnet_id: subnet_id
        subnet_mapping: subnet_mapping
      properties:
        subnet_id:
          description: The subnet reference ID in the provider cloud
          type: string
        subnet_mapping:
          description: The region/zone of the subnet
          type: string
        is_primary:
          description: If the subnet is used for the primary NIC
          type: boolean
      title: Subnet Data
    SubnetDataResponse:

      example:
        id: 046b6c7f-0b8a-43b9-b35d-6489e6daee91

          subnet_id: subnet_id
          subnet_mapping: subnet_mapping
      properties:
        id:
          description: The ID of the subnet
          format: uuid
          type: string
        subnet_data:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/SubnetData'
      title: Subnet Data Response
    NetworkDataResponse:
      description: Information about cluster network
      example:
        vpc:
          id: 046b6c7f-0b8a-43b9-b35d-6489e6daee91
          vpc_data:
            vpc_id: vpc_id

            cloud_info:
              region: us-west2
            cidr: cidr
            cloud_project: cloud_project
          num_clusters: 0
        subnets:
        - id: 046b6c7f-0b8a-43b9-b35d-6489e6daee91

        - id: 046b6c7f-0b8a-43b9-b35d-6489e6daee91
          subnet_data:
